title: Linux Basics you need to know: Who Am I? #shorts #linux #kalilinux
description: If you want to learn a lot more, watch the Linux Basics for Hackers video series with OTW. First video:   #linux #kalilinux #windows
transcript: It's important that you learn Linux. When you log into a Linux computer on this example a Linux virtual machine and type the command whoami you can see who you logged in as in this example I'm using Kali Linux but here I'm using Ubuntu you can actually see your username over there so David is my username who am I shows me that there's my username and I'm Kali in this example if I type su that allows me to escalatemy privileges and become root so whoami shows me that I'm now root if I type exit and type whoami I'm back to being Kali. On Ubuntu as an example su whoami I'm now root exit I'm back tobeing David. So whoami allows me to see who I'm logged in as and su allows me to escalate my privileges and become root on a system.
